headlines.description: Crystal Palace ended their eight-game winless streak with a 2-0 Premier League victory over struggling Burnley at Selhurst Park on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Palace end winless run with victory over Burnley

events.name: Brighton & Hove Albion at Huddersfield Town

headlines.description: Steve Mounie's red card proved crucial as Brighton came from behind to beat Huddersfield 2-1.
headlines.shortLinkText: Brighton bounce back to beat 10-man Huddersfield

video.headline: Huddersfield 1-2 Brighton: Seagulls capitalize on red card

tracking.trackingName: Huddersfield 1-2 Brighton: Seagulls capitalize on red card

headlines.description: Leicester City gave their home fans some timely festive cheer by securing their first Premier League win at the King Power Stadium since September w

video.headline: Leicester 2-0 Watford: Maddison on the mark

tracking.trackingName: Leicester 2-0 Watford: Maddison on the mark

headlines.description: Relentless Manchester City made it six Premier League wins in a row with a 3-1 victory over Bournemouth on Saturday, moving them five points clear o

video.headline: Man City 3-1 Bournemouth: Six in a row for Blues

tracking.trackingName: Man City 3-1 Bournemouth: Six in a row for Blues

headlines.shortLinkText: City go five clear with win over Bournemouth

events.name: West Ham United at Newcastle United

headlines.description: Javier Hernandez scored twice on a rare start for West Ham in their 3-0 win at Newcastle.
headlines.shortLinkText: Hernandez double helps West Ham to 3-0 win

video.headline: Newcastle 0-2 West Ham: Heroic Hernandez seals three points for Hammers

tracking.trackingName: Heroic Hernandez seals three points for Hammers

venue.fullName: The Friends Provident St Mary's Stadium

headlines.description: Stuart Armstrong and Cedric had put Southampton 2-0 up, but Romelu Lukaku and Ander Herrera earned a point for Manchester United.
headlines.shortLinkText: Man Utd come from behind to draw at Southampton

video.headline: Southampton 2-2 Man United: Reds fight back but underwhelm again
